description: This file defines REST API routes for managing device entities in a backend system using Express framework. It includes endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting devices, with authentication and permission checks, and performs SQL queries to a PostgreSQL database.

methods.name: list devices
methods.description: Handles GET request to list all devices with optional filtering and pagination.

methods.name: get device by id
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve a single device by its ID, including associated protocols.

methods.name: create device
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new device with provided details.

methods.name: update device
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update an existing device's details.

methods.name: delete device
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to remove a device by its ID.
